posts.post_content:
Ten generally well-centered cards in BVG holders are for sale.  None lower than VG.  Five priced under $100 Wow.  Three Hall of Famers and one Southern Leagues card.  Will consider offers, but for heaven's sake be reasonable.

Shipping is included.  Prefer payment by check, but will accept PP F&F (Friends and Family, not Friends and Flippers)

Exquisite VG copy of Gordon Hickman - the Southern Leaguer - $240

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10112/hickman-sl[/IMG]


VG+ Doc Hoblitzell - Piedmont 350 - $OLD  Haggle Completed

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10113/hoblitzell[/IMG]


VG+ George Hunter - Piedmont 350 - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10118/hunter[/IMG]

VG/EX Fred Jacklitsch - Piedmont 150 - $OLD
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10119/jacklitsch[/IMG]


EX+ (5.5) HOF Hugh Jennings Dancing Both Hands - SC 350 - $OLD 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10124/jennings-both-hands[/IMG]


VG (3) HOF Hugh Jennings One Hand - Piedmont 460 - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10125/jennings-one-hand[/IMG]


VG+ (3.5) Fielder "Hip" Jones - SC 350 - $OLD   Haggle Completed

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10127/jones-f-hands-on-hips[/IMG]


VG (3) Tim Jordan Batting (with a bat you can hardly see) - SC 350 - $OLD Haggle Completed

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10128/jordan-t-batting[/IMG]

VG/EX (4) Ed Karger - Piedmont 150 - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10130/karger[/IMG]


VG+ (3.5) HOF Joe Kelley - Piedmont 350 -  Kingpin of the Orioles -$OLD  

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10131/kelley[/IMG]
When I saw the thread title I thought you were looking for 10 partners to go in on the SCP T206 Wagner half lol

[quote name="ruth-gehrig" post=2187521]When I saw the thread title I thought you were looking for 10 partners to go in on the SCP T206 Wagner half lol[/QUOTE]

Maybe I should have titled it:

"Looking For 10 Haggling Adversaries"
Frank, you have the wrong back scan for Joe Kelley.

[quote name="Natedog" post=2187606]I'll take the Hunter[/QUOTE]

I'll let you have the Hunter.  

i will also PM with contact addresses and payment info.

[quote name="Pat R" post=2187609]Frank, you have the wrong back scan for Joe Kelley.[/QUOTE]

That mistake was made over 10 years ago Pat.  I believe the statute of limitations has expired for that offense.

I believe Joe is just a Piedmont 350.

Cannot rectify the error now, but will later today.

Only Hickman remains in this listing now.

Thanks to all the friendly buyers.  

Will be listing more cards soon.  Stay tuned.
